title: Stacey Solomon celebrates 30th birthday by feeding baby Rex on the toilet

As a hands on mum of three, Stacey Solomon is never off duty - even on her 30th birthday.

The Loose Women star revealed on Instagram that she was celebrating her milestone day sat on the loo while feeding her four-month-old son Rex.

"So this is 30," laughed Stacey in the caption, as she shared the candid snap of her with Rex and eldest sons Leighton and Zachary with her followers.

With the help of dad Joe Swash, Stacey's eldest boys surprised her in the bathroom with some pink balloons left her over from her more traditional celebrations the night before.

(Image: staceysolomon/Instagram)

(Image: staceysolomon/Instagram)

Stacey had been treated to a plush birthday dinner party at her sister's house surrounded by her nearest and dearest.

The room was decorated in a pink-themed with candles, napkins and huge helium balloons in Stacey's favourite shade.

After the meal, the birthday girl was treated to some presents and cards from her family before they sang happy birthday to her in front of her cake.

(Image: staceysolomon/Instagram)

(Image: staceysolomon/Instagram)

"I love my family very much. Even though none of them can sing a note," laughed Stacey.

The mum-of-three also revealed that she'd spent the whole day in tears over all the love she'd received.

She also told fans she'd sobbed earlier in the day because her baby Rex had managed to lift his head up, even though it wasn't for the first time.

Stacey was also overwhelmed to find London Transport's All on the Board even dedicated a special post to her on her 30th, calling her 'Dagenham's finest.'

This year marks ten years since Stacey found fame on ITV's The X Factor , when she was 19-years-old.

After impressing the judges, Stacey made it to the live shows and finished third behind Olly Murs and winner Joe McElderry.

She went on to win I'm A Celebrity a year later in 2010 before landing a full time role on Loose Women.
description: The Loose Women star sobbed her way through her birthday bash before her sons surprised her in the bathroom
